channel.title: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes
channel.description:
Every time I open BM it will just let me play about 1min sometime even few second and then pop up an error message [img]https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10200162257898221&set=a.1791879535816.71225.1804482980&type=1&theater[/img]
Please help me:'(:'(:'(

item.title: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Actually for me BM is working perfectly on Windows 8.1 , though I did hear that for some, it breaks down like a dry stick.

Read full topic
item.source: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes

item.title: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Uninstall windows 8 and install windows 7 SP1 don’t forget to update to the latest DirectX and install Microsoft Visual C++ 2.0, 2.0SP1 2.5 3.0 4.0 4.5 etc and all the Microsoft .Net runtimes also.

If it still crashes try setting heapsize to half your vram (in steam launch options for BM put -heapsize 512000 (for 1gb vram))

Read full topic
item.source: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes

item.title: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Flatline is right. We need system specs (like your graphics card, or your op system).

  • For a start I suggest to uninstall and completely delete Black Mesa, then download and install it again.
  • Also update your drivers.

Read full topic
item.source: Keep stop working after I open BM in few minutes
